original_title: Air Force chief abruptly retires early in latest Pentagon shakeup | CNN Politics
article_summary: US Air Force Chief of Staff, Gen. David Allvin, announced his retirement halfway through his term, citing Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth's plans to remove him from the job. This marks another early departure of a senior military officer under Hegseth and President Trump. Allvin expressed gratitude for his service and the Air Force's transformational initiatives during his tenure.</s>
